column4: Hello can someone help me to install the 'Kernel-source' or 'kernel-devel' it must be RPM installed and I need to specify the kernel path with the '--kernel-source-path' in the command line... my video card drivers are asking me for that anyone one knows how to install that?
Ubuntu uses .deb files, not RPM files
but it is easy to install your kernel source simply type "sudo apt-get install linux-source"
it should be /usr/src/linux, but you may need to decompress it first
